#define SO3_ERROR_GENERIC ( comment   ) 
Value:
{                                                                       \
  printf("ERROR: %s.\n", comment);                                      \
  printf("ERROR: %s <%s> %s %s %s %d.\n",                               \
         "Occurred in function",                                        \
           __PRETTY_FUNCTION__,                                         \
           "of file", __FILE__,                                         \
           "on line", __LINE__);                                        \
  exit(1);                                                              \
}
